## WrapOptions interface

Options for configuring the wrap behavior

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface WrapOptions 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[keepNewlines?](./terminal-reflowjs.wrapoptions.keepnewlines.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to preserve existing newlines in the input If false, newlines are removed and the text is reflowed Default: true


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[limit](./terminal-reflowjs.wrapoptions.limit.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Maximum line width (number of printable characters)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[newline?](./terminal-reflowjs.wrapoptions.newline.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Newline character(s) to use when wrapping


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[preserveSpace?](./terminal-reflowjs.wrapoptions.preservespace.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to preserve leading spaces after a forced line break If false, leading whitespace after a forced wrap is trimmed Default: false


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[tabWidth?](./terminal-reflowjs.wrapoptions.tabwidth.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Width of tab characters in spaces Default: 4


</td></tr>
